title: Why do you continue to restrict us?
body: First, I love the new experimental features! Only complaint, not enough of them. Lots and lots of developers use Linux simply because of the customization offered by those OSs, so give us more!

comments.body: It would be nice to see more colours than just FG and BG. Also being able to set where a window opens would be nice. (As in, from the start command)
